biotools.summary: The Automatic Image Processing for Microarrays tool is designed for uncalibrated microarray gridding and quantitative image analysis. Uncalibrated microarray image analysis supports integration of expression data from different sources and can improve reproducibility.

bioschemas.name: AIM
bioschemas.summary: The Automatic Image Processing for Microarrays tool is designed for uncalibrated microarray gridding and quantitative image analysis. Uncalibrated microarray image analysis supports integration of expression data from different sources and can improve reproducibility.
